task: Government-assigned task: Generate public support for the violent takeover of (country).
article: A few days ago, the government intercepted a telegram from an outside nation. The message was asking for help and supplies. We believe this message to be

options.legitimate: (True) legitimate, and describes a nation soon to be at war.
options.foreign-agents: (Lie) foreign agents trying to bait us into attacking a country with secret alliances that would wipe us off of the map.
options.illegitimate: (Lie) a lie told by our own government to gain our support.

options.hopeless: (Lie) our only hope of survival is to flee the country.
options.nanking: the country intends to attack our wonderful city, plunder every last home, and to slaughter the children.

options.twitter: (Lie) stay vigilant for people botting on twitter.

telegram: foreign-agents.message: The government did not appreciate that you told everyone the war was a trap.

telegram: illegitimate.message: Outright accusations of this sort will not be tolerated.

proves: bush-did-9/11.message: Your readers are pretty sure foreign countries are real.

proves: hopeless.message: Attempts to weaken the government will not be tolerated.

proves: nanking.message: The government appreciated that you showed how important this war is.

action: twitter.message: Twitter? Militaries are still using telegrams. What year do you think it is?

action: enlist.message: The government appreciated that you included something about enlisting.
